# Support

Need help with **StremGo**? Here's how you can get support:

## FAQ & Documentation

Please check our README and documentation for answers to common questions.

## GitHub Issues

If you have found a bug or want to request a feature, please open an [issue](https://github.com/Bo0ii/StremGo/issues).

## Community Discussions

Use the [Discussions](https://github.com/Bo0ii/StremGo/discussions) tab for:
- General questions
- Sharing ideas or feedback
- Help from the community

## Security Issues

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it via GitHub's security advisory feature.

Thank you for using StremGo!
